text: mc harvey has opened up about his split with ex-wife alesha dixon , telling celebrity big brother housemates he ` got off lightly ' after his affair with singer javine hylton was exposed . the so solid rapper spoke of the regret he felt following the collapse of their one-year marriage . he also revealed that his actions which led to their divorce in 2006 had gone on to affect all of his relationships . opening up : mc harvey told his housemates that his ex-wife alesha dixon handled their divorce ` graciously ' sitting in the garden , talking to danica thrall and jasmine lennard , he told the girls his version of events after alesha found out he had cheated on her with singer javine , 30 , just a year after they wed. . addressing reports that he and alesha , 33 , had a massive fallout after news of his infidelities surfaced , harvey , 33 , said : ` since the day that i actually got divorced there 's never been one . cross word or beef . ' i got off lightly , she dealt with it graciously . ' cheater : alesha and the rapper -lrb- left -rrb- wed in 2005 but their marriage collapsed when it was revealed he had been unfaithful with singer javine -lrb- right -rrb- . however , harvey also opened up about the pain he felt when dixon , who he dated for five years before getting married , eventually left without even putting up a fight . he said : ` what made it worse is when she went i 'll . take what 's mine and you take what 's yours and get out of my life , and i . was like  oh ! ' the 33-year-old also confessed that cheating on the britain 's got talent judge has made finding love harder , as he has since struggled to settle down . he added : ` what makes it worse , every . time i get serious with a girl they go back to that moment . ' adding her two cents , jasmine said the fact the couple did n't have children made his affair ok , as she believed he would have never cheated if they did have a family together . the 27-year-old said : ' i do n't believe you would have done that if kids were involved . ' not happy : rhian sugden took to the diary room to talk about how she was after her fallout with jasmine . also in tuesday night 's cbb round-up , jasmine 's attitude was all the contestants could talk about , following her blow up last night with rhian sugden . coronation street legend julie goodyear referred to her as ` looney ' and julian clary said that he was doing his best to avoid her . at the start of the episode rhian took to the diary room to talk about how she was feeling after her row with jasmine . feeling drained : julie goodyear told the glamour model that jasmine 's attitude was tiring . when questioned about how she was feeling , she told big brother : ' i feel horrific today because of what happened last night . i ca n't help but feel bad on jasmine . ' upset at the whole situation she continued : ` why should everyone have to tip toe around her ? i do n't like confrontation . ` it 's draining for the rest of the house , unnecessary drama and it has to be me who has to deal with it . she 's this feisty queen of the damned . ' ` she 's trying to fake me ' : harvey told ashley mckenzie that he believed jasmine was using him . and at the end of the show , harvey told olympian ashley mckenzie that he believed the feisty model was ` fake ' as they sat in the hot tub . the mc said : ` this girl . is trying to use me , now she 's trying to fake me . i listen ` cos i 'm a . nice guy but she 's trying to fake me . ' brand new : the feisty model took to the diary room to reveal that she believed she was changing for the better . meanwhile in the diary room , the model was boasting about the fact that she felt people in the house liked her . jasmine said : ` these people have changed me for the better , its hardcore emotional boot camp sort of stuff , it 's hard . they are seeing my madness and my badness . i 'm finding people are coming to me completing and encouraging me . ` there 's people that like me here and that 's really cool , ' she smiled . rockstar : for today 's shopping task housemates had to spend big and martin kemp was asked by big brother to wreck a hotel room in three minutes which he successfully completed . yesterday -lrb- tuesday -rrb- marked the first day of the housemates ' shopping task . and it was all about spending big , as the contestants had to spend to win money for their shopping task , as big brother gave housemates # 1000 to try and blow before the end of the day . harvey quickly became big brother 's first target as he was asked to come into the diary room several times to buy a red zentai suit for # 5 . he agrees and over the afternoon he is called into the diary room seven times and ends up buying six before turning down the seventh suit . martin kemp showed off his rockstar ways as he was sent a mission to trash a hotel room to add to their shopping fund . harvey and his zentai suits : the so solid rapper donned six colourful suits before turning the seventh one down .
